title: Hey @riot may you post here my elo history?
body:
I changed my account from server quite a few times in the past years and for that reason I think websites like lolking can't identify properly all elos I had and give me a summary that is 100% wrong. 

I have been playing since season 3, could you post here for me a summary of my account?

replies.body: I wouldn't be able to post your entire history here, but if there is a certain bit of data you're trying to get you might be able to find it on our [**privacy website**](http://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/). It goes over a lot of the history of your account but if what you're looking for isn't on that site, then hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
